summary:
Lead U.S. payroll reconciliation for ~5,000 employees, ensuring compliance and accuracy.
- Reconcile $1.2B annual payroll biweekly with an error-free execution
- Developed and launched RSU/ESPP auditing processes
- Designed and implemented state/local taxation audits to prevent compliance issues
- Partner with benefits and stock teams to improve payroll coordination and reporting
- Ensure SOX payroll compliance by supporting internal and external audits

Conducted payroll audits and system reconciliations for 15,000–25,000 permanent and seasonal employees.
- Automated payroll validations with Alteryx, reducing manual work
- Led payroll reconciliation and supported recovery of wage overpayments
- Managed offboarding payroll for 10,000+ employees annually
- Supported ADP GlobalView implementation and payroll audit testing

role: Records Management Lead & HR Compliance Auditor
summary:
Promoted within six months to oversee records management and HR compliance.
- Developed and implemented a company-wide retention policy
- Led large-scale I-9 and personnel file audits for compliance
- Managed secure retrieval and organization of sensitive employee records
